titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: Intervals without rain were utilized in the morning by a walk, in the afternoon by a jaunt in the steamer to Greenock & back. I took some photographs of the Battleship 'Sao Paolo'.
On Wednesday, August 31st 1910, I returned to Westminster, and went into residence the day following. Harold came & removed his possessions.
On Saturday Inge & his wife arrived to stay till Monday.
